column1: #text=I wanted to do something special for her , so I decided to bake a cake from scratch .
#text=I preheated my oven so it was nice and warm by the time i was done preparing the cake batter .
#text=Then , I gathered all the necessary ingredients for baking a cake .
#text=There are a lot of ingredients so I wo n't get into much detail about what went into it .
#text=After gathering all the cake ingredients , now it was time to mix them together .
#text=I got the largest bowl in my house and put all of the dry ingredients in it .
#text=Then , in a separate bowl , I mixed together all of the wet ingredients .
#text=Then i combined the wet and dry ingredients into the large bowl , and began to beat them until it was well blended .
#text=I poured the cake batter into a cake pan and put the cake in the oven for 30 minutes .
#text=When it was done , I took it out the oven and let it cool off .
#text=We had the cake after dinner and it was a huge success !
